name: SummerDevDiscoRPG
description:
Demo/Prototype of a disco themed turn-based RPG for GavinCraft Studios SummerDev jam. Didn't get as much done as I would have liked but it might be fun for a few minutes :)

Written in c++ using SDL,OpenGL,GLEW. Links to assets used are in credits.txt.

Code available: https://bitbucket.org/williamblair/gamelibrpg/src/master/
